trans-unit.source: Recognizes ink gestures.
trans-unit.target: Reconhece gestos de tinta digital.

trans-unit.source: A GestureRecognizer identifies an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: Um GestureRecognizer identifica um gesto de tinta digital.

trans-unit.source: You can set the GestureRecognizer to recognize all or a subset of application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir GestureRecognizer para reconhecer todas ou um subconjunto de gestos de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: To set the GestureRecognizer to recognize a subset of the available gestures, pass an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> array to the constructor or use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o GestureRecognizer para reconhecer um subconjunto dos gestos disponíveis, transmita um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>matriz para o construtor ou utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contains a gesture, call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>contém um gesto, chamada o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # XAML texto utilização não é possível utilizar esta classe no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When it is created with this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes all application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Quando é criado com este construtor, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>reconhece todos os gestos de aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use the GestureRecognizer constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes a subset of the application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o construtor de GestureRecognizer para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>reconhece que um subconjunto de gestos a aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> will recognize.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> que especifica os gestos de aplicação a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> reconhecerá.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you finish using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando acabar de utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>foi occupying.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os gestos que os <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> reconhece.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that contains gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> is set to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> que contenha gestos o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> está definido para reconhecer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean that indicates whether the gesture recognizer is available on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor boleano que indica se o reconhecedor gesto está disponível no sistema do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o componente de reconhecimento estiver disponível. caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Looks for gestures in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Procura gestos especificado no <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the Recognize method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: A matriz devolvida pelo método Recognize está ordenada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, Recognize may return a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> array with the following values: |Index|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, Recognize pode devolver uma matriz de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>com os seguintes valores: | Índice | ApplicationGesture | RecognitionConfidence | |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |&0; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&1; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&2; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&3; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| Isto significa que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>reconhece que é muito provável que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>é uma marca de verificação, relativamente provável que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>não um gesto de e provavelmente não em todas as que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>é um curlicue ou um duplo curlicue.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Recognize method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> at a higher <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Reconhece o método pode devolver uma matriz com <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>num superior <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>que outros gestos de aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que é mais provável que <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>é não gesto, por oposição a um gesto de que tem um inferior <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to search for gestures.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> para procurar gestos.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"></xref> that contains application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognized.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"> </xref> que contém a aplicação gestos que os <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: Sets the application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Define os gestos de aplicação que o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> reconhece.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures you wish the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> que especifica os gestos de aplicação que quer o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> para reconhecer.
